amendment.description: To prohibit Federal funds being made available to a prohibited entity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3967, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 48. Record Vote Number: 191.

action.text: Amendment SA 3967 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5891) To prohibit Federal funds being made available to a prohibited entity.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3967 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3695.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3967, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 48. Record Vote Number: 191.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3967, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 48. Record Vote Number: 191.
